com.estimote.sdk

Interface BeaconManager.NearableListener

  • Enclosing class:
    BeaconManager

    public static interface BeaconManager.NearableListener
    Callback to be invoked when nearables are discovered nearby.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNearablesDiscovered(List<Nearable> nearables)
      Invoked by default each second.

    • Method Detail

      • onNearablesDiscovered

        void onNearablesDiscovered(List<Nearable> nearables)
        Invoked by default each second. Can be configured via BeaconManager.setForegroundScanPeriod(long, long).
        Parameters:
        nearables - List of nearby nearables sorted by their signal strength.
